author: wrowe
msg: Authored html (or xml) should live in xdocs

author: markt
msg: Use the re-factored JAR scanning code to scan JAR for web-fragments and parse any that are found. Discovered fragments are not yet used to configure the web app.

author: cutting
msg: AVRO-99.  Use Boost framework for C++ unit tests.  Contributed by Scott Banachowski.

author: apetrelli
msg: Removed the tiles-test.war from the binary assembly, it will be released as a WAR file.
Documentation is separated from the binary assembly.
Fixed source assembly, added new modules.

author: mmartinec
msg: DKIM.pm/POD: document that quotes may be omitted in eval-rule
arguments on domains consisting only of letters, digits and
dots (btw, it would be handly if Parser.pm would allow a '-'
too, which is quite common in domain names)
